explanation: [0-0] A man in a white shirt sits in front of a white table, holding a transparent goblet in his right hand. The mouth of the goblet is placed on the table, with a small red ball inside. There is another transparent glass in front of the camera. You can see a black background behind the man.

[0-5] Then the man rotates the goblet, making the small ball run up along the wall of the goblet. He immediately puts the goblet on the transparent glass, and the small ball falls into the glass below. The man looks at the camera happily. Then a man in a black shirt appears in the picture. He sits in front of a marble table, holding an upside-down goblet in his right hand. There is a ping pong ball in the goblet, and a transparent glass beside it. You can see a white refrigerator and a white door behind the man. The man rotates the goblet in his right hand to make the ping pong ball run up along the wall, then puts the goblet on the other glass, and the ping pong ball falls into the glass below. The man then looks at the camera with a surprised expression and opens his mouth.
